panels.description: Number of active peer streams connected to the gRPC server
panels.title: Connected peers

panels.description:
Duration of calculating the peer network map that is sent to the clients

When you see a lighter color on a higher timing bucket, your users may experience issues.
panels.title: GetPeerNetworkMap Latency

panels.description:
Duration of triggering the account peers update and preparing the required data for the network map being sent to the clients.

When you see a lighter color on a higher timing bucket, your users may experience issues.
When you see a lighter color on a higher timing bucket, your users may experience issues.
panels.title: UpdateAccountPeers Latency

panels.description:
Duration of how long it takes to save or delete an account in the store

Will let you know if the DB is not keeping up with the requests coming from management
panels.title: Database persistence  latency

panels.description:
Duration of how long it takes to execute a transaction in the store

Will let you know if the DB is not keeping up with the requests coming from management
panels.title: Database transaction latency

panels.description: Number of sync gRPC requests from the peers to establish a connection and receive network map updates (update channel)
panels.title: Sync request rate

panels.description: Duration of the login gRPC requests from the peers to authenticate and receive initial configuration and relay credentials
panels.title: Login request rate

panels.description:
Duration of the sync gRPC requests from the peers to establish a connection and receive network map updates (update channel)

If those are to high client will probably retry before management is able to respond
panels.title: Sync request latency

panels.description:
Duration of the login gRPC requests from the peers to authenticate and receive initial configuration and relay credentials

If those are to high client will probably retry before management is able to respond
panels.title: Login request latency

panels.description:
Duration of the sync gRPC requests from the peers to establish a connection and receive network map updates (update channel).

When you see a lighter color on a higher timing bucket, your users may experience issues.
panels.title: GRPC Sync Latency

panels.description: Number of gRPC requests from the peers by message type
panels.title: gRPC Requests

panels.description: Duration of the sync gRPC requests from the peers to establish a connection and receive network map updates (update channel) p95
panels.title: gRPC Sync Request p95 Duration

panels.description:
Duration of the login gRPC requests from the peers to authenticate and receive initial configuration and relay credentials.

When you see a lighter color on a higher timing bucket, your users may experience issues.
panels.title: GRPC Login Latency

panels.description: Number of sync gRPC requests per second from the peers to establish a connection and receive network map updates (update channel)
panels.title: gRPC Sync Request rate

panels.description: Duration of the login gRPC requests from the peers to authenticate and receive initial configuration and relay credentials p95
panels.title: gRPC Login Request p95 Duration

panels.description: Duration of how long it takes to save or delete an account in the store p95
panels.title: Store Persistence p95 Duration

panels.description: Number of login gRPC requests per second from the peers to authenticate and receive initial configuration and relay credentials
panels.title: gRPC Login Request rate

panels.description:
Duration of how long it takes to save or delete an account in the store.

When you see a lighter color on a higher timing bucket, your users may experience issues.
panels.title: Store Persistence latency

panels.description: Duration of how long a process holds the acquired global lock in the store
panels.title: Global lock acquisition p95 Duration

panels.description:
Number of requests to send to the IdP by request type.

A high number for a long period might indicate an inconsistency between the number of local users and IdP.
panels.title: IdP Requests

panels.description:
Duration of how long it takes to execute a transaction in the store.

When you see a lighter color on a higher timing bucket, your users may experience issues.
panels.title: Store Transaction latency

panels.description: Duration of incoming write HTTP requests p95
panels.title: Write HTTP API Requests p95 Duration (PUT/POST/DELETE)

panels.description: Duration of incoming HTTP requests p95
panels.title: HTTP API Requests p95 Duration

panels.description: Number of incoming red HTTP requests by endpoint
panels.title: HTTP Read request counter

panels.description: Duration of incoming read HTTP requests

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le) (rate(management_http_request_duration_ms_total_bucket{application="management", type="read", environment="$environment", host=~"$host"}[$interval])))

panels.title: Read HTTP API Requests p95 Duration (GET/OPTIONS)

panels.description:
Number of updates with new meta data from the peer.

Constant high numbers of meta updates indicate a version with an issue. This can generate an issue on larger deployments since it will trigger an account-wide network map update.
panels.title: Peer meta updates counter

panels.description: Duration of update channel operations by operation
panels.title: Update Channel methods p95 Duration

panels.description: Ratio between closed and created update channels

matcher.options: C {__name__="management_updatechannel_create_duration_micro_sum", closed="true", environment="production", host="management", instance="localhost:8081", job="prometheus.scrape.local"}

panels.title: Percentage of Recreated channels

panels.description: Number of update messages piling up in the update channel queue
panels.title: UpdateChannel Queue length max

panels.description: Number of active peer streams connected to the gRPC server over time
panels.title: Connected peers historical

panels.description:
Number of update messages piling up in the update channel queue.

A high queue number indicates either a network issue or a high number of account updates.
panels.title: Update Channel heat map

panels.description:
Duration of triggering the account peers update and preparing the required data for the network map being sent to the clients.

When you see a lighter color on a higher timing bucket, your users may experience issues.
panels.title: UpdateAccountPeers Latency

panels.description: Number of objects in the network map like peers, routes, firewall rules, etc. that are sent to the clients
panels.title: NetworkMap Objects
